title: Bacterial DNA and serum IgG antibody titer assays for assessing infection of human-pathogenic and dog-pathogenic Porphyromonas species in dogs
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Masako Tai-Tokuzen, Takashi Ito, Kazuya Tamura, Haruko Hirayama, Hirohito Ogawa, Shin Nakamura, Keisuke Okubo, Kazuhiro Omori, Tadashi Yamamoto, Katsumi Mominoki, Shogo Takashiba
